avalancheActivity.comment: Some small avalanches fell in W-facing hills in the Hengill area after a lot of snowfall between christmas and new years. A small slab avalanche from a cornice was triggered by staff member of Bláfjöll on the 3rd of January.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs and fresh snow are in almost all aspects. Weakness in the snowpack is present at little depth and small avalanches could fall where snow has accumulated.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of new snow fell at the end of december that has been transported, buried or been through melt-freeze cycles. At least 40 cm of new snow has fallen since. A snowpit was taken in the Bláfjöll ski resort on the 3rd of January that showed a shallow weakness in the snowpack. Stiff slab snow has formed on top of a weaker powder snow and this could be expected widely in W-facing hills. Cohesion with older layers seemed good.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east earlier this week and there is considerable snow in mountains, especially in W faces. A weakness in the snowpack was discovered in the north in apr. 1000 m height. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday that is expected to last throughout the week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east and there is considerable snow in mountains. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Nýr snjór féll á föstudegi í hægum vind og það frystir til fjalla á laugardag. Úrkomulaust og lítill vindur á laugardag en hlýindi og rigning fylgja SA strekking á Sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet slab released in Kirkjubólshlíð on Tuesday.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in the end of December and couple of dry avalanches fell. At lower elevation the snowpack has gone though freeze/thaw.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow in the end of December and couple of dry avalanches fell. At lower elevation the snowpack has gone though freeze/thaw.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east earlier this week and there is considerable snow in mountains, especially in W faces. A weakness in the snowpack was discovered in the north in apr. 1000 m height. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday that is expected to last throughout the week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east and there is considerable snow in mountains. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday.

weatherForecast.highlights: S-læg átt. Hlýnar á sunnudag og verður hlýtt í næstu viku. Úrkomulítið næstu daga.

avalancheActivity.comment: Large avalanches were recorded in Skíðadalur on January 2nd and likely released due to warming on 1st and 2nd of January. A size 2.5 avalanche was likely released by snowmobilers in Hólsdalur on Dec 30th. An avalanche was reported on S aspect in Ólafsfjörður Dec 31st. Another large avalanche, size 3.5 was released on SW facing aspect in Hestskarðshnjúkur on Dec 30th as well as a few smaller ones.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow fell in NE-wind in the last days. On Monday and Tuesday warming reached up to around 600 m and has affected the snow with crust forming and strengthening of snow pack. Above 600 m, the snow is still dry and persistant weakness can be found in the snow pack in upper elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow fell in NE-wind in the last days. On Monday and Tuesday warming reached up to around 600 m and has affected the snow with crust forming and strengthening of snow pack. Above 600 m, the snow is still dry and persistant weakness can be found in the snow pack in upper elevations.

A weakness in the snowpack was discovered in the north in apr. 1000 m height. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday that is expected to last throughout the week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east and there is considerable snow in mountains. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlæg átt og úrkomulítið. Hlýnar á sunnudag með hvassari SV-átt, útlit fyrir að það verði frostlaust til fjalla. Áframhaldandi hlýindi og suðlæg átt í næstu viku.

avalancheActivity.comment: Couple of medium avalanches in Eskifjörður and Fagridalur after the new snow on Thursday. Many wet slab avalanches fell on the 1st - 2nd of January in the region. The largest of those where estimated to be 3,5 in size. Most of them fell within the elevation range of 4-500 meters in SW facing hills. Wet loose avalanches also fell in Seyðisfjörður in the same episode.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in the mountains since Friday and couple of medium avalanches in Eskifjörður and Fagridalur. Chances of unstable wind slabs in SW facing hills.

snowpackStructure.highlights: 15-30 cm of new snow is now in the mountains after a NE snowfall on Thursday. This snow is likely compacted by the wind and wind slabs have likely formed in SW facing hills. A lot of new snow fell in early january that melted shortly after. This triggered many wet avalanches in the region with an elevation span of 4-500 m.a.s.l.. Freezing temperatures have returned since the snowfall on Thursday and it will last until Saturday before another wave of heat is expected. The snowpack is likely unstable where the new snow has drifted and accumulated in depressions and gullies.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east earlier this week and there is considerable snow in mountains, especially in W faces. A weakness in the snowpack was discovered in the north in apr. 1000 m height. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday that is expected to last throughout the week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow with E-winds fell in the north and east and there is considerable snow in mountains. Instability will increase all around the country in warming weather on Sunday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Nýr snjór féll á föstudag en úrkomulaust og kalt verður á laugardag. NV 10-15 m/sek en víða hvassara til fjalla. Á Sunnudag lægir síðan og hlýnar í um 5-7 gráður.
